Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LPcin-YK3 (bovine cathelicidin, cattle, ruminant, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.30021422] Gram-positive bacteria :Streptococcus mutans KCCM 40105 (MIC=1.25 μg/ml), Propionibacteria acnes KCCM 41747 (MIC=1.25 μg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621 (MIC=0.62 μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria :Porphyromonas gingvalis KCTC 5352 (MIC=0.62 μg/ml), Escherichia coli KCCM 41290 (MIC=1.25 μg/ml);Fungi :Candida albicans KCTC 17712 (MIC=10.0 μg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.30021422] 0% hemolysis  at 40 μg/ml against mouse red blood cell
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: LPcin-YK3 peptide is a random coil in aqueous solution and forms an
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria, Antifungal activity agaist Candida albicans

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activity of Antimicrobial Peptide LPcin-YK3 Derived from Bovine Lactophoricin
Literature.Author: Ji-Sun Kim,Ji-Ho Jeong, Jang-Hee Cho,Dong-Hee Lee and Yongae Kim
